original_text: And it shall come to pass, that him that escapeth the sword of Hazael shall Jehu slay: and him that escapeth from the sword of Jehu shall Elisha slay.
korean_text: 하사엘의 칼을 피하는 자를 예후가 죽일 것이요 예후의 칼을 피하는 자를 엘리사가 죽이리라

sentences.original_text: And it shall come to pass
that him that escapeth the sword of Hazael
and him that escapeth from the sword of Jehu
